title: LogMeIn Breaks Out, More Networking Earnings On Tap
text:
New High Analysis: Insurer Clears Cup-With-Handle Base 
Stocks ended sharply lower Friday, resulting in quiet action in the new-high list. Universal Insurance (NYSE:UVE) was an exception. Shares rose 0.90 to 28.09. The small-cap name cleared a cup-with-handle buy point of 27.49. With a Composite Rating of 99, the highest possible, the company has a lot ... 06:43 PM ET Stocks Lower Near Midday; LogMeIn Breaks Out 
Stocks worsened near midday Friday after trading mixed earlier. Even the tech-laden Nasdaq turned red, but just barely. The Dow Jones industrial average and the S&P 500 were off 0.4% each, while the Nasdaq slipped 0.1%. Turnover was tracking mildly higher on both major exchanges compared to the ... 11:51 AM ET Stocks Wobble In Soft Trade; Under Armour, Southwest Gap Up 
Stocks struggled in and out of mixed territory in early trade Thursday as the market quaffed down a barrelful of significant earnings reports. The Nasdaq rose 0.3%. The S&P 500 clung to a fractional gain. The Dow Jones industrial average hung 0.1% in the red. For all the big volume stock moves, ... 07/23/2015 10:40 AM ET 
Shares of five tech stocks — including one Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) supplier — are abuzz late Wednesday following a slew of view-topping earnings results. Cybersecurity firm Fortinet (NASDAQ:FTNT) spiked 9% in extended trading, after reporting flat year-over-year Q2 earnings of 11 cents a ... 07/22/2015 05:53 PM ET F5 Networks Stock Rises On Fiscal Q3 Earnings Beat 
F5 Networks (NASDAQ:FFIV) late Wednesday reported fiscal Q3 earnings and revenue above expectations, sending the data center gear maker's stock up in after-hours trading. Seattle-based F5 Networks said that it earned $1.67 per share in the June quarter, up 20% from the year-earlier period. Revenue ... 07/22/2015 04:48 PM ET Cirrus Surges On Earnings, Other Chips Await Results 
The chip designers industry group bounced back quickly from a rough session on Wednesday as Cirrus Logic (NASDAQ:CRUS) in particular had a quick reversal of fortune. Hurt by disappointing iPhone sales numbers Wednesday, shares came back with a vengeance Thursday in response to Cirrus' earnings ... 07/23/2015 06:35 PM ET Homebuilders Rally On Heels Of Strong Economic Data 
The housing market is on fire, and homebuilder stocks are starting to perk up. The residential and commercial building group, which ranks in the top third of IBD's 197 industries, was a leading performer Wednesday, helped by earnings news and strong home sales data. Existing home sales in June ... 07/22/2015 05:53 PM ET Southwest, Alaska Stocks Diverge Ahead Of Q2 Results 
The airline industry has fallen from a No. 1 rank to the bottom half of IBD's 197 industry groups in just a few months. But it's still outperforming the broader transportation sector, up a fraction year-to-date vs. a nearly 10% slide for the Dow Jones transportation average. The group also is ... 07/21/2015 07:05 PM ET Ethical-Drug Firms Horizon Pharma, Bristol-Myers Rally 
Specialty drugmaker Horizon Pharma jumped more than 3% to a new high Monday after it issued strong preliminary Q2 sales and raised its full-year guidance. Horizon (NASDAQ:HZNP) said sales in the quarter were about $170 million to $172 million, roughly a 160% increase over the year-earlier quarter ... 07/20/2015 06:50 PM ET Etsy Stock Jumps On Google's Latest Search Algorithm Tweaks 
Etsy soared Friday after Google cited the online marketplace for handcrafted and vintage goods as one of the sites benefiting from its latest search algorithm tweaks.
